definition: to talk about sth
to speak/to explain/to negotiate/to emphasise/to be particular about/as far as sth is concerned/speech/lecture
to (a place)/until (a time)/up to/to go/to arrive/(verb complement denoting completion or result of an action)

sentences.english: But we've seen the beginnings of this.
sentences.chinese: 但我们已经讲到它的开端了。

sentences.english: Sophie liked to practice her English and the conversation went veering onto many different subjects.
sentences.chinese: 索菲很喜欢练习英语，我们讲到了许多不同的话题。

sentences.english: Of the examples of crossed boundaries given above which happens most often to you?
sentences.chinese: 上面讲到的跨越界限的例子哪些最常发生在你身上？

sentences.english: Now we're in the Common Era,so this 66 CE.
sentences.chinese: 现在我们讲到了公历纪元，所以是公元66年。

sentences.english: This will be the last step we cover today.
sentences.chinese: 这是我们今天讲到的最后一步了。

sentences.english: So, that's how we get to the syllabus.
sentences.chinese: 我们就这样讲到了教学大纲。

sentences.english: In one chapter he returns to the impoverished region of South Wollo.
sentences.chinese: 在书中的一章节讲到他回到了挝娄南部的贫困地区。

sentences.english: About the only thing Auletta's marvelous piece doesn't address is the reading experience.
sentences.chinese: 奥莱塔精彩谈话中唯一没有讲到的就是阅读体验。

sentences.english: This is similar to the principle described Chapter 2 of opening your mind.
sentences.chinese: 这个原则和第二章讲到的打开你的思维相似。
这一讲到这里就结束了。

sentences.english: So let me write where I am now, or we are now.
sentences.chinese: 下面来总结一下我们讲到哪了。

definition: to speak/to explain/to negotiate/to emphasise/to be particular about/as far as sth is concerned/speech/lecture
to mention/to raise (a subject)/to refer to
to talk about/to mention/(preposition) as for
to refer to/to speak about/to talk about
to expound (a position)/to elaborate (on a topic)/to treat (a subject)
treatise/discourse/exposition
start of literary work/opening song of ballad in Tanci style 彈詞|弹词[tan2 ci2]
to discuss/to talk about
to return to the topic (idiom)/to get back to the main point
to mention/to raise (a subject)/to bring to sb's attention
to recount
to say sth
we/us/ourselves/our
to persuade
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
variant of 說|说[shuo1]
pertaining to/concerning/with regard to/about/a matter of
a list/to list/to enumerate
